column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered Jinya's Tonkatsu Black and replaced their noodles with thick noodles as recommended by the waitress and fellow yelpers and after trying it
column2: I can see why. The broth was great
column3: not too salty like other places I have been to. Although I liked their marinated egg
column4: Austin's Ramen Tatsuya takes the lead on that one. We also ordered their Takoyaki for the appetizer. Although I'm typically not a fan of Takoyaki
column5: there's was the best I have tried. My one complaint about this was that the appetizer came out the same time our ramen did so it wasn't much of an appetizer. Will definitely come here again next time I'm in Houston.
